q: the move a special day for the franchise as Mike Munchak became the first former player to coach the team. Hall of Famer Warren Moon , Mike Munchak 's teammate, said in a statement released by the Titans that it was just a matter of time until he would have success in coaching. Some folks have to go the coordinator route to reach the head coaching level, but being in the organization as long as he has, there is a comfort level with him and everyone knows who he is as a coach and a person. they found no gold, they broke thirteen vitrines and threw the antiquities on the floor,'' Zahi Hawass said on his blog. The looters then entered Tutankhamun's galleries and opened one case. The criminals found a statue of the king on a panther, broke it, and threw it on the floor, he said. Zahi Hawass added that all of the damage can be restored. As a result, as reported by AP, Egypt deployed police and soldiers to the museum to secure its artifacts.

, Fiat boss Sergio Marchionne said in remarks on Feb. 5. His comments on were quoted by Italy's Corriere della Sera, prompting the mayor of Turin, Fiat's birthplace, to demand ''immediate clarification.'' It's clear that an international group can have several offices but it would be different if the headquarters were in the United States, Sergio Marchionne said. A number of leading politicians also expressed indignation, and ANSA news agency said talks were planned next week between Sergio Marchionne and Economic Development Minister Paolo Romani .
